actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to limit the exercise of the contempt powers of the courts of the United States in environmental disputes.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to provide that the civil and criminal contempt powers of Federal courts shall not extend to disputes involving the overall effectiveness of a treatment system where an officer or employee of a State or local government is exercising good faith discretion in an official capacity.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to limit the exercise of the contempt powers of the courts of the United States in environmental disputes.
